mapper.select: select A.employee_id as id, A.employee_name as employeeName, B.program_name as programName from employees A, fitness_programs B where A.employee_id = B.employee_id and B.program_name = #{value}

select program_no as no, program_name as name, program_start_date as stardDate, program_end_date as endDate, program_start_hour as startHour, program_end_hour as endHour, program_quota as quota, program_request_count as requestCount, program_price as price, program_status as status, program_created_date as createdDate, program_updated_date as updatedDate, employee_id as employeeId, fitness_program_category_no as fitnessProgramCategoryNo from fitness_programs order by program_no asc
